description:
Saeko meets her ex-lover Asakura who is an agent from Interpol. He asks for her help to apprehend a murder suspect who has escaped to Japan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Trigger Covered with Scratches! Detective Saeko Loved
Kizudarake no Trigger! Saeko ga Aishita Keiji
傷だらけのトリガー! 冴子が愛した刑事
